TEXT.TITLE: JOHN WILEY AND SONS INC <WILLB> 3RD QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Qtr ended Jan 31 Shr 72 cts vs 71 cts Net 3,062,000 vs 3,023,000 Revs 58.5 mln vs 56.4 mln Nine mths Shr 2.10 dlrs vs 1.73 dlrs Net 8,972,000 vs 7,337,000 Revs 169.9 mln vs 161.7 mln Note: Net includes gain from sale of land of 1,105,000 dlrs or 26 cts a share for the nine mths. Reuter
